abstract.text: Mesh network manager is the main entry point for the mesh network. It manages the network,
allows sending and processing messages to and from bearers and initializes
provisioning procedure.
Bearers are objects responsible for delivering PDUs to remote nodes. Bluetooth mesh, among others. defines
ADV Bearer and GATT Bearer. Due to API limitations on iOS the ADV Bearer is not available. An iPhone
can be connected to the mesh network using a GATT connection to a node with GATT Proxy feature.
GATT Bearer is used when connecting to a node with GATT Proxy feature. It uses a GATT connection
instead of Bluetooth advertising. Messages sent over that bearer need to be proxied to the network
using ADV Bearer by the GATT Proxy node.
PB Remote Bearer allows to provision a device which does not support GATT Mesh Provisioning Service
via a node with Remote Provisioning Server model.
Provisioning is the process of adding an unprovisioned device to a mesh network in a secure way.
In order to reduce the number of Network PDUs exchanged between a Proxy Client and a
Proxy Server, a proxy filter can be used.

inlineContent.text: The nRF Mesh library allows to provision Bluetooth mesh devices into a mesh network, configure
them and send and receive messages.
The library is compatible with the following
Implementing ADV Bearer on iOS is not possible due to API limitations.
The library is using GATT Proxy protocol, specified in the Bluetooth Mesh Protocol 1.1,
and requires a Node with GATT Proxy feature to relay messages to the mesh network.
To learn how to use the library, start here:

abstract.text: Provision, configure and control Bluetooth mesh devices with nRF Mesh library.
The Config Low Power Node PollTimeout Status is an unacknowledged message
used to report the current value of the PollTimeout timer of the Low Power
Node within a Friend Node.
How to load or create a network.

doc://NordicMesh/documentation/NordicMes.title: Creating and loading a network configuration

The Node Identity contains information from Node Identity or Private Node Identity
beacon.
A Private GATT Proxy Get message is an acknowledged message used to get the
current Private GATT Proxy state of a Node.
The scheduler second.
A Remote Provisioning Scan Stop message is an acknowledged message that is used
by the Remote Provisioning Client to terminate the Remote Provisioning Scan procedure.
A set of supported PDU types by the bearer object.
The Firmware Distribution Firmware Delete message is an acknowledged message sent by
a Firmware Distribution Client to delete a stored firmware image on a Firmware Distribution Server.
A set of supported Input Out-of-band actions.
The Light LC Property Status is an unacknowledged message used to report the
Light LC Property state of an Element.
The base class for response messages.
The Light LC Occupancy Mode Set is an acknowledged message used to set the
Light LC Occupancy Mode state of an Element.
A set of generic mesh errors.
